column17:
The Combo comprises of Hugo Boss Perfume Deodorant and After Shave Balm for men from Archies. This is a perfect combo for men to be groomed and ready for the hectic day ahead. The Perfume is a b masculine fragrance any man can wear. It will keep you refreshed all the time you wear it and go out. The deodorant is apt for you to keep you away from the unwanted odour. It will keep you refreshed and is retained for longer duration. The after shave balm will sooth your skin after your shave. This also leaves behind the fragrance when once applied.

Features

Hugo Boss Perfume
  • How To Use: Apply in day or night before going out
  • Skin Types: All skin types
  • Ingredients: Apple bergamot and cinnamon

Hugo Boss Deodorant
  • How To Use: Use after shower or whenever required
  • Skin Types: All skin types
  • Ingredients: Cedar wood and sandal wood

Hugo Boss After Shaves
  • How To Use: Put on the balm on the shaved area or desired area
  • Skin Types: All skin types
  • Benefits: Keeps you refreshed and sooth your skin
  • Ingredients: Vetiver and Olive wood
